name: Cubes (itch) (yjonas83)
description:
Goal

Match as many cubes in the middle circle to cube on the outer circle.

How to play?

  1. Click on the rotation icons to rotate cubes in the circle.
  2. You have 6 clicks to get as many matches as you can.
  3. You must use all clicks.
  4. After using all clicks, you must have 6 matches to continue.
  5. If you don't have 6 matches, you lose.
